mapper.select: select count(case when projectsstate not in(57) then 1 else null end) as sum ï¼Œ count(case when projectsstate= 116 then 1 else null end )as fail, count(case when projectsstate= 85 then 1 else null end )as sucess from projects

select count(*) as sum , TO_CHAR(p.addtime,'YYYY-MM-dd') as time from originator o,projects p where o.projectsid = p.projectsid and (to_number(sysdate-p.addtime)) < 7 group by TO_CHAR(p.addtime,'YYYY-MM-dd') order by time
select sum(capital) as sum, TO_CHAR(time,'YYYY-MM-dd') as time from profit p where (to_number(sysdate-time)) <7 group by TO_CHAR(time,'YYYY-MM-dd') order by time
select count(*) as y ,w.value as name from orders o, word w where o.ord_status=w.key group by w.value
select t.protypename as name , sum(capital) as y from projects p, protype t,profit f where f.projectsid=p.projectsid and p.protypeid=t.protypeid group by t.protypename
